House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05025
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 6234, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS, "AN ACT CREATING THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM AND DISSOLVING THE NATIONAL WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE AUTHORITY; AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
SHORT TITLE : " Streamlined Metropolitan Waterworks And Sewerage System ( M W S S )function Act "
ABSTRACT : Amends existing law to reflect the practical reality that MWSS is now a purely regulatory agency. Enumerates the attributes, powers and functions of the System to limit its role as a Regulatory body.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-13
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-17
          -TWG created for all bills proposing to create a central body for the water sector, to be chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-07
          -1st TWG Meeting, secretariat instructed to request Com on Rules to jointly refer water bills to the Coms on Public Works and Highways and Govt Reorg (primary com)
      3. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2018-03-07
          -Letter to Com on Rules for water bills to be jointly referred to the Com on Govt Reorg (as lead) and Coms on Govt Enterprises and Public Works and Highways (as secondary coms)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2017-02-20
